'''Tome of Lies''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s Level 4 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* The Japanese name of the constellation is likely a reference to a Kyougoku Natsuhiko novel {{ja|巷説百物語|Kousetsu Hyaku Monogatari|tl=A Hundred Tales of Karma.}}
